'''Beta 1.20.10.25''' (Android) is the fifth and final beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.10]], released on June 23, 2023<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/17027817308045-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-20-10-25-Android-Only|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.20.10.25 (Android Only)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 23, 2023}}</ref>, which fixes a crash on Android. This is the first beta/''Preview'' to be labeled as "beta".
